home.ctaTitle: Ready to bring nature into your home?

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Learn more about our mission and values
about.story1: Tilija Nursery is a family business that has been selling ornamental plants and flowers for more than 30 years. Our mission is to bring nature into your homes and help you create beautiful and healthy spaces.
about.story2: We started as a small nursery in Pločica, and today we are one of the most reliable suppliers of ornamental plants in Serbia. Our team is here to help you choose the perfect plant for your space.
about.naturalDesc: All our plants are naturally grown without chemicals and pesticides.
about.qualityDesc: We provide only the highest quality plants that are carefully selected and maintained.
about.reliabilityDesc: Our customers are our priority. Always here to help and advise.
about.sustainabilityDesc: We are committed to environmental protection and sustainable business.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We are here to help you and answer all your questions. Write to us or call us!
contact.name: Full Name
contact.success: Message sent successfully! Thank you for contacting us.
contact.error: An error occurred while sending the message. Please try again.
contact.locationDesc: Our nursery is located in the village of Pločica, near Kovin. You can easily find us and come by car on the local road.

products.title: Our Offer
products.subtitle: In our nursery you can find the highest quality seedlings for your yard and garden. View the selection of the most sought-after plants:

footer.description: Your reliable partner for ornamental plants and flowers. Quality and beauty in every plant.

1.name: Thuja Smaragd
1.description: Thuja Smaragd is an evergreen conifer, perfect for hedges and yard decoration. Resistant, easy to maintain and grows fast.

2.name: Yew
2.description: Yew (Taxus) is a long-lived conifer, excellent for shaping and hedges. Grows slowly but is extremely decorative.

3.name: Black Pine
3.description: Black Pine is a beautiful evergreen tree with characteristic dark green needles. Resistant and fits well into various landscapes.

4.name: Thuja Orientalis
4.description: Thuja Orientalis is an evergreen conifer, ideal for hedges and yard decoration. Compact and resistant.

5.name: Blue Spruce
5.description: Blue Spruce is a beautiful evergreen tree with characteristic blue-gray needles. Excellent for decorative purposes.

6.name: Juniperus Horizontalis
6.description: Juniperus horizontalis (creeping juniper) is a perfect ground cover. Low and dense growth, ideal for covering ground, rockeries and slopes.

7.name: Catalpa
7.description: Catalpa is an ornamental tree with large leaves and beautiful white flowers. Provides shade and adds special beauty to any yard.

8.name: Magnolia Grandiflora
8.description: Magnolia Grandiflora is a beautiful evergreen tree with large white flowers and beautiful fragrance. True ornament of any yard.

9.name: Cherry Laurel
9.description: Cherry Laurel is an evergreen shrub, ideal for dense, elegant hedges. Resistant to frost and urban conditions.

10.name: Photinia Red Robin
10.description: Photinia Red Robin is an evergreen shrub with attractive red young shoots. Ideal for decoration and forming hedges.

11.name: Pennisetum alopecuroides
11.description: Pennisetum alopecuroides is a decorative perennial with beautiful inflorescences. Ideal for landscape designs and yard decoration.

12.name: Bamboo
12.description: Bamboo is a fast-growing grass that creates a natural hedge and gives an exotic landscape. Ideal for modern designs.

13.name: Hydrangea
13.description: Hydrangea is a beautiful flowering shrub with large spherical flowers in various colors. Ideal for decorating gardens and yards.

14.name: Ivy (Hedera helix)
14.description: Ivy (Hedera helix) is an evergreen climber, ideal for covering fences and walls. Decorative all year round, fast and dense growth.

15.name: Lonicera Nitida
15.description: Lonicera nitida is a dense and modern green hedge. Perfect choice for low hedges and shaping spaces.

16.name: Heuchera
16.description: Heuchera (Coral Bells) brings color and elegance throughout the year. Ideal choice for decorative gardens.

17.name: Hibiskus
17.description: Hibiscus is exotic beauty for any space. Perfect choice for yards, terraces and decorative gardens.

18.name: Spirea
18.description: Spirea offers abundant flowering and easy care. Ideal choice for yard decoration.
